Specific Details: This meeting was an overview of Irish drugs policy from our perspective. We looked over the main issues and provided some potential solutions that could be implemented via a presentation. We then discussed the presentation, and discussed key areas of interest for the party and answered any questions that were there. We also discussed the potential for a parliamentary question around the adult caution scheme.
Subject Matter: This meeting was an overview of Irish drugs policy from our perspective. We looked over the main issues and provided some potential solutions that could be implemented via a presentation. We then discussed the presentation, and discussed key areas of interest for the party and answered any questions that were there. We also discussed the potential for a parliamentary question around the adult caution scheme.
Intended Results: We intended to inform the Social Democrats' drugs policy toward a model focused around harm reduction and compassion, inspired and influenced by evidence. We believe that a fair, compassionate and evidence-based drug policy is essential for any political party.::To bring to the attention of the Social Democrats the many failures of Irish drugs policy in order to inform their legislative objectives in the Oireachtas.
Lobbying Activities: Meeting via ZOOM that was attended by Deputy Cairns and Social Democrats Policy Director Eamon Murphy|Virtual Meeting|1

Subject Matter: Grants and incentives for the encouragement of Shared Mobility, Car Sharing & Ride Sharing and for the deployment of Remote Piloted Vehicles and Autonomous Vehicles.
Intended Results:
Party Policy Adoption 
€2500 voucher for each household for a Car-Sharing club that gives up a private car, 
(Similar to the car scrappage scheme) 
€1000 voucher for any household outside urban centres that does not have any private car.

Households or businesses that signs their electric car up to a Car-Sharing / Ride-Sharing club can earn up to €10000 tax-free (similar to the rent-a-room scheme)

These vouchers can be used to purchase a new EV. 
Autonomous or Remote Driving capable vehicles.
